intro:
Like anime and lolis.
English is not my native language.

post.body: Hey, how much censorship you have encountered in ZeroNet?

Found very useful blocklist with some "porn sites" in it: http://127.0.0.1:43110/13CgSQeywg2ius5pjXVCk7dKUCRkz5xvW3/
You can even self-censore yourself with one switch and block all sites from that list!
Where can I get more?

Why there is no reshare/repost buttons?
Here is a good article from @Radioangel I want to share you with
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MhRrHfS7d7AimbrPhsNFP7PLJtGTzqjRr/?Post:11:Rules+For+Thinking,+Analysis,+Writing
(work in progress for now)
Well, looks like I'm on single hub now... probably.

Suddenly, I discovered Create Profile link on ZeroMe!
http://localhost:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Create+profile

Where was normal link to that page? I just suddenly find it on someone's message
I wish this place was more alive.
Is there some unmoderated site catalog with free site adding in ZeroNet? Now I can find only bunch of half-dead lists with moderated content.
Is there some way to autogenerate ZeroNet blocklists?

Don't know who is created this hub migration tool, but he/she is amazing! Very useful tool. (always backup your data before using it)
http://localhost:43110/1QHbf72f4vdx3QAxN1LTN9KP19J428Q85R/

comment.body:
Maybe he was pretty unpopular in real life.
Next step would be creating AI fans.
@Pexo: Well, I messed up with registration, when for some reason everything stopped working. And so now I'm on three hubs at once... I don't know what to do with that.
I hope at least somebody can.
@Realjohndoe: Sounds pretty troublesome. I don't want to suddenly remove half of my timeline one day.
@Realjohndoe: Still can't believe I can post any shit and nobody can do anything about it.
@Bussdee: Do I need to visit a doctor just because you don't like this kind of art?
@Bussdee: Oh, I can wish you a good luck in gathering my IP.
@leftside: Who was harmed when I posted that two-dimensional image with human-like object on it? It's not even a photo, not a porn Who the victim?

@Bussdee: Ok, you started with a suggest to "visit a doctor", but now you already wishing to imprison me? Just for posting an image? What will be next to satisfy your parental fears? Maybe you wish me to die? If you have blood pressure problems just because of one single image in the internet, maybe you should consider to visit a doctor?

@leftside: "Some people were born as addicted cardgame gamblers. But by cutting his fingers he can rescue himself from committing sins." - oh my God, I have nothing to say. Is this how you solve gambling problems in Korea?
"But anyone can cut or glue to fix it." - yeah, and additionally get stigma for the rest of their lives, because of peoples like you who will hunt them afterwards to punish them for what they are. No matter was it succesful fix or not.
This is Art, no matter what you said. And I will continue to post it (maybe in a more appropriate places).
Today you wish to prohibit this art, but what art you will have wish to prohibit tomorrow? What about naked ancient statues? How much people they triggered to rape acts?
Of course you have right to exist. At least I hope that you would be a responsible pedo and would not harm anyone.
@Nekololi: Reminds me "We're only immortal for a limited time" from Dan Swano - The Big Sleep.
@Nekololi: By the way, I'm happy to see you here.

@Aassddff: I'm thinking about concept of project, that can aggregate every single site in ZeroNet, without exceptions. But also with ability to set tags to classify added sites content by crowd. And after that autogenerator can generate blocklists for sites with certain tags on it.
So it will help all people to find what they are searching, but also help to protect people from undesirable content.
